Your Seed Phrase is used to generate and recover your account. Please save these 12 words on a piece of paper. The order is important. This seed will allow you to recover your account. I understand that if I lose my seed phrase,\nI will not be able to recover my account.
Enter the following words to verify your Seed Phrase Word #%1$d>
University Degree Government ID Proof of Employment Health Insurance

Please enable the App to use Touch ID under Settings Enable Touch ID Not Now Use Fingerprint as Pin Change Pin Code Enter your PIN Incorrect PIN CODE Pins has to be the same Your current PIN is incorrect Pin length must be %1$d characters long Reset Data Delete contacts & credentials Reset You have already connected with: Contacts and credentials successfully removed Are your sure you want to\nreset data? Your contacts and credentials\nwill be deleted Please reset the data in the settings\nand reset the inactive city map.
